MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML11 postcode areas of Sandilands and Rigside. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:09am. Our engineers are on their way to the Headtown substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:30am on Thursday, 18 February 2021
